snippet: While everyone was disappointed with the news Friday that the Kentucky Derby and the Preakness Stakes winner I'll Have Another would be unable to run because of a tendon injury, there is an old show-biz expression that "the show must go on." It did,...
abstract: While everyone was disappointed with the news Friday that the Kentucky Derby and the Preakness Stakes winner I'll Have Another would be unable to run because of a tendon injury, there is an old show-biz expression that "the show must go on." It did, and what a show it was.

headline.main: An Open Letter to New York's Governor
